descript.abstract: This data represents the boundaries of the California electric utilities. Some boundaries may overlap and contain one or more utilities responsible for the area.Note: This data is a graphic representation of electric utility service territories. The file has not been certified by a Professional Surveyor. This data is not suitable for legal purposes. The purpose of this data is to provide a generalized statewide view of electric service territories. The data does not include individual or commercial releases. A release is an agreement between adjoining utilities that release customers from one utility to be served by the adjoining utility. A customer release does not change the territory boundary. The file has been compiled from numerous sources and as such contains errors. The data only contains the electric utility service territories and the name of the utility.
descript.purpose: Electric utility service territories for California.

idinfo.datacred: CEC GIS Unit, REAT, CalISO, PG&E, SCE, SDG&E, LADWP, WAPA, IID, SMUD, MID, MWD, GE, Platts, ANZA Electric Cooperative, Bear Valley, City of Anaheim PUD, City of Colton, City of Vernon, Plumas Sierra PUC, Riverside Public Utilities, and Silicon Valley Power.
